# University (Building)
## Overview
**University**

**Create** 94 Goods, 10 Influence, 88 Labor, 2 Magic (4,140 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 2 [[Classroom (Room)|Classrooms]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Greenhouse (Room)|Greenhouse]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Observation Dome (Room)|Observation Dome]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[8 - Scriptorium|Scriptorium]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]]

An institution of higher learning.
